title: Triphala Gummies (Child-Friendly)
excerpt: Chewable, tasty triphala gummies for children and adults—gentle digestive and antioxidant support.
content:
## What Are Triphala Gummies?
A child-friendly version of the classic Ayurvedic digestive blend Triphala, made into chewable gummies with fruit pectin and natural sweeteners.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Triphala supports digestion, bowel regularity, and gentle detoxification while providing antioxidant nourishment.

### Key Benefits
- Gentle bowel regulation.
- Antioxidant-rich support.
- Easy alternative for those who dislike powders.

## Ingredients
- Triphala extract
- Fruit pectin
- Natural sweeteners (honey/jaggery alternatives)

## Usage Instructions
- Take 1 gummy daily or per label instructions.

## Packaging
- Child-safe jar with secure lock and clear dosing.

## Safety & Consultation
- Consult pediatrician for children under 5 or if the child has GI conditions.

## Why Choose This Product?
A tasty, convenient, travel-friendly way to enjoy the benefits of Triphala.
